name: CLUNK
detailed_description:
CLUNK is a high-octane physics-based party brawler, perfect for playing with your friends via couch co-op, or alone in single-player or online multiplayer modes.

- Challenge your friends in online or local multiplayer, or team up against a set of AI-controlled enemies
- Multiple single-player modes, including Survival and Time Attack
- 5 Customizable characters - select your gear and colour before plunging into an all-out brawl
- Unique levels of varying size and scale, filled with environmental hazards
- Easy to grasp, hard to master gameplay
about_the_game:
CLUNK is a high-octane physics-based party brawler, perfect for playing with your friends via couch co-op, or alone in single-player or online multiplayer modes.

- Challenge your friends in online or local multiplayer, or team up against a set of AI-controlled enemies
- Multiple single-player modes, including Survival and Time Attack
- 5 Customizable characters - select your gear and colour before plunging into an all-out brawl
- Unique levels of varying size and scale, filled with environmental hazards
- Easy to grasp, hard to master gameplay
short_description: Punch, slam, grab and throw your opponent as far as you can in a brand new physics-based brawler.  Up to 8 players can join the fight in online or local multiplayer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 780
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
